price: 33. Así castiga Al-lah (en esta vida a quien se excede); pero el castigo de la otra vida es aún mayor, ¡si supieran!
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡعَذَابُۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika al-ʿadhābu walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati akbaru law kānū yaʿlamūna
